tabs.title: Good To Know
tabs.description: Check-in: 02.00 pm – Check-out: 12.00 pm – 24 hour reception Non smoking Hotel – Free Wi-Fi

tabs.title: Services & Amenities
tabs.description: Check-in: 02.00 pm – Check-out: 12.00 pm – 24 hour reception Non smoking Hotel – Free Wi-Fi

acf.title: Dream 1
acf.description:
Pearl Suite
With 25 guest rooms and a great variety of room types to choose from. Standard amenities in all rooms include central air-conditioning / heating, private bath, cable / satellite flat screen TV, music, direct dial telephone, refrigerator, hair dryer, shaver plug, coffee & tea courtesy tray, free wireless.
Up to 4 guests are allowed
acf.amenities:
• Refrigerator
  • Safe Deposit Box
  • Soundproof Windows
  • Wake-up Call
  • Welcome Drink
  • Wi-Fi Internet Access (free of charge)
  • Writing Desk
  • Coffee Facilities
  • Daily Maid Service
  • Direct dial telephone
  • Electronic Locks
  • Flat Screen TV
  • Guest Laundry
